name: plex-rewind
tagline: A tool for generating recap clips from Plex libraries
description: Plex-Rewind is a self-hosted tool that generates recap clips from shows in Plex. It extracts key scenes to create summaries, helping viewers refresh before watching the next episode.

features.title: Recap Generation
features.description: Automatically create recap videos from previous episodes of TV shows

features.title: Scene Extraction
features.description: Identify and extract key scenes from episodes for summary content

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connect to Plex Media Server to access and process library content

features.title: Custom Duration
features.description: Configure recap length to match your preferred summary duration

features.title: Automated Processing
features.description: Generate recaps automatically when new episodes are added to library

features.title: Quality Settings
features.description: Adjust video quality and compression for recap file size optimization

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Intelligently detect episode boundaries and important plot points

features.title: Storage Management
features.description: Configure where recap videos are stored and manage disk space usage
